frequency.description: The frequency of the payment in seconds, e.g. per day is 86400 seconds, per month is 2592000 seconds. If no balance is available the subscription halts.

timeNext.description: The timestamp of the next payment.

alias.description: The Alias Id for alias renewal subscriptions

aliasName.description: The Alias Name for alias renewal subscriptions

tld.description: The Alias' namespace Id aka Top Level Domain for alias renewal subscriptions

tldName.description: The Alias' namespace Name aka Top Level Domain for alias renewal subscriptions
